## EXECUTION PACKET (Template)

- Packet ID:
- Task name:
- Classification:
- Gate status: (PASS or BLOCKED)
- Why: (≤2 bullets)
- Spec (verbatim):
- Deliverables:
- Stop condition:
- Risk notes (max 3 bullets):

### Breakage & Tests (REQUIRED)
- Breakage (≤3 bullets):
  - …
  - …
  - …
- Checks/tests (≤3 bullets):
  - …
  - …
  - …

### Bugfix rule — Repro-first (ONLY if this packet is a bugfix)
- Repro-first included? (Yes/No)
- Repro steps / observable failure:
- Expected vs actual:
